IRPact_modellierung.processModel

Class KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • IRPact_modellierung.processModel.AdoptionReplacementScheme
      • IRPact_modellierung.processModel.KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme

  • public class KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme
extends AdoptionReplacementScheme
    AdoptionReplacementScheme that represents the behavior of ConsumerAgents to adopt a product when a product is discontinued

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void readopt(ConsumerAgent consumerAgentConcerned, Product productConcerned, double simulationTime)
      Readopting a product means to find out all needs (now) unsatisfied (all that could be satisfied by the product lost), and to schedule a number of need events straight away for these needs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme

        public KieslingAdoptionReplacementScheme()

    • Method Detail

      • readopt

        public void readopt(ConsumerAgent consumerAgentConcerned,
                    Product productConcerned,
                    double simulationTime)
        Readopting a product means to find out all needs (now) unsatisfied (all that could be satisfied by the product lost), and to schedule a number of need events straight away for these needs. These NeedEvents are ordered by their strength (NeedNeedIndicator map of the corresponding NeedDevelopmentScheme).
        Specified by:
        readopt in class AdoptionReplacementScheme
        Parameters:
        consumerAgentConcerned - The ConsumerAgent readopting
        productConcerned - The Product being replaced, causing the readoption
        simulationTime - The current time of the simulation

      • removeProductFromAgents

        public void removeProductFromAgents(SimulationContainer simulationContainer,
                                    Product productToBeRemoved)
        Removing the product from the agents means that each agent forgets about the product. If they adopted it, they will unadopt, and create needevents via the readopt method.
        Specified by:
        removeProductFromAgents in class AdoptionReplacementScheme
        Parameters:
        simulationContainer - The container the simulation runs in
        productToBeRemoved - The product that gets removed from the simulation
